name: IOT Energy Solution Analytics App
description: This App allow the Users to detect Anomaly, receive regular Alerts and perform predictive analytics on the Forecasts.

appStages.name: Introduction
appStages.stageDetails:
{"components":[{"label":"HTML","attrs":[{"attr":"","value":""}],"content":"

IOT Energy Solution Analytic App

IE

Overview

The IoT Energy Solution Analytic App is designed to help businesses and energy providers monitor, analyze, and optimize energy consumption and generation across multiple devices and locations. Leveraging advanced data analytics and predictive modeling techniques, the system provides comprehensive insights into energy usage patterns and helps in proactive management of energy resources.

Key features

  • +
  • The system simulates detailed minute-by-minute data for multiple energy devices over a year period, covering metrics like energy generation, consumption, voltage, and power.
  • +
  • It provides summary statistics and visualizations (histograms, box plots) to explore data distribution and variability, helping identify central tendencies and outliers.
  • +
  • Time series plots display energy trends over time for each device, facilitating the detection of temporal patterns and comparisons among devices.
  • +
  • Utilizes the Prophet model for forecasting future energy generation and the Z-score for spotting anomalies, aiding in proactive management and future planning.

Key insights

    +
  • Generates plots to identify outliers and visualize energy metric distributions across devices.
    • +
  • Plots time series of energy generation and energy consumption for each device, facilitating trend analysis over time.
    • +
  • Utilizes Prophet to forecast future energy generation values for devices, displaying predicted trends and uncertainties.
    • +
  • Computes Z-scores for energy metrics to detect anomalies based on deviations from the mean, visually represented on plots.
    • +
  • Identifies and prints alerts when energy generation exceeds a specified threshold, visualizing alerts on time series plots for clear identification.

appStages.name: Exploring-IOT-Data
appStages.stageDetails:
{"components":[{"label":"HTML","attrs":[{"attr":"","value":""}],"content":"

Exploring IOT Energy Data

Overview

  • + Users can analyze IoT data by computing summary statistics to understand metrics like energy generation and consumption across devices. They can visualize these metrics using histograms to explore their distributions and frequencies. Box plots help identify outliers and compare metric distributions across different devices, aiding in anomaly detection and trend analysis.
","refreshOnChange":false,"key":"html","type":"htmlelement","input":false,"tableView":false},{"label":"Columns","columns":[{"components":[{"label":"HTML","attrs":[{"attr":"","value":""}],"content":"

Actions

  • + Select a Device for which Energy Generation and Energy Consumption graph has to be plotted.
  • + Select one or multiple Devices under the Select Device.
  • + Click on 'Explore Data' to perform the analysis.
","refreshOnChange":false,"key":"html1","type":"htmlelement","input":false,"tableView":false}],"width":6,"offset":0,"push":0,"pull":0,"size":"md","currentWidth":6},{"components":[{"label":"HTML","attrs":[{"attr":"","value":""}],"content":"

Outputs

  • + Chart illustrating the Box Plot for all the devices.
  • + Chart displaying the Correlation Table and Correlation Matrix.
  • + List of Devices.
  • + Timeseries plot of Energy Consumption and Energy Generation for the selected devices.

appStages.name: Time-Series-Model-Training
appStages.stageDetails:
{"components":[{"label":"HTML","attrs":[{"attr":"","value":""}],"content":"

Training Forecasting Model

Overview

    +
  •    Applying Prophet to forecast Energy Generation for Devices, capturing seasonal and trend components over a granular time series..
    • +
  •    Implementing Prophet for scalable forecasting that can adapt to changing patterns in Energy Generation and Energy Consumption data, allowing for continuous refinement as new data comes in.
    • +
  •    Evaluating the forecasting model's accuracy using statistical measures like Mean Absolute Percentage Error (MAPE) to determine how closely forecasted values align with actual data.
","refreshOnChange":false,"key":"html","type":"htmlelement","input":false,"tableView":false},{"label":"Columns","columns":[{"components":[{"label":"HTML","attrs":[{"attr":"","value":""}],"content":"

Actions

  • + Select a Device for which the Forecasting model has to be trained for Energy Generation and Energy Consumption Forecasting.
  • + Select the model (Daily or Hourly) on the basis of which the training of the Forecasting model for the device will be done.
  • + Click 'Start Model Training' to initiate model training and evaluate its performance.
","refreshOnChange":false,"key":"html3","type":"htmlelement","input":false,"tableView":false}],"width":6,"offset":0,"push":0,"pull":0,"size":"md","currentWidth":6},{"components":[{"label":"HTML","attrs":[{"attr":"","value":""}],"content":"

Outputs

  • + Row Values containing Prediction Values.
  • + A Graph Plot containing Actual vs Forecasted Energy Generation or Energy Consumption on the chosen model (Hourly or Daily) basis for the device.
  • + Row Values containing Mean Absolute Percentage Error (MAPE) to assess the forecasting model’s accuracy.

appStages.name: Anomaly Detection
appStages.stageDetails:
{"components":[{"label":"HTML","attrs":[{"attr":"","value":""}],"content":"

Anomaly Detection

Overview

    +
  •    Visualize and detect the anomaly in the Energy Generation.
    • +
  •    Using Z-Score method to find Anomalies in Energy Generation over Hourly and Daily basis.
","refreshOnChange":false,"key":"html","type":"htmlelement","input":false,"tableView":false},{"label":"Columns","columns":[{"components":[{"label":"HTML","attrs":[{"attr":"","value":""}],"content":"

Actions

  • + Select a Device for which the Anomaly has to be calculated for Energy Generation.
  • + Select the model (Daily or Hourly) on the basis of which the Anomaly in Energy Generation will be calculated for the selected device.
  • + Click 'Detect Anomaly' to initiate Anomaly Detection and evaluate its performance.

  • + A graph plot chart representing Anomalies in Energy Generation on houly basis.
